com.camerontec.catalys.util.fast.template

Interface ITemplateRegistry

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LargeIdsTemplateRegistry, ScpInboundContext, StandardTemplateRegistry

    public interface ITemplateRegistry
    Registry of all templates, accessible by their template identifiers which are assumed to be taken from the id portion of each template name.

    The id is also assumed to be an unsigned int.

    "For example, when using FIX over FAST, a typical use of auxiliary identifiers would be to specify the FIX tag number on each field. Another possible use of auxiliary identifiers would be to assign static template identifiers to be used in the communication between two parties that do not support dynamic template exchange and identifier assignment."

    "A template identifier is represented as an Unsigned Integer in the stream. ...This specification does not define how to map an identifier to the name of a template. A particular implementation may choose to use statically allocated template identifiers. In this case, auxiliary identifiers in the concrete syntax can be used to convey the mapping."

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear()
      Clears all registered templates.
      ITemplate find(int id)
      Retrieve template corresponding to given ID.
      ITemplate register(ITemplate template)
      Registers a template with the registry using the id portion of the template's name.

    • Method Detail

      • clear

        void clear()
        Clears all registered templates.

      • find

        ITemplate find(int id)
        Retrieve template corresponding to given ID.
        Parameters:
        id - ID of template requested
        Returns:
        Template with given id, or null if none found.

      • register

        ITemplate register(ITemplate template)
        Registers a template with the registry using the id portion of the template's name.
        Parameters:
        template - Template to be registered.
        Returns:
        Previous template registered with this id - null if none.
